name.description: The name of the feature. It serves as a unique identifier for the feature.

description.description: The description of the feature. It provides more details about the purpose of the feature.

project.description: The project to which the feature belongs.

type.description: The type of the feature, e.g., A/B Test, Feature Toggle, etc.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the feature is currently enabled or not.

stale.description: Indicates if the feature data is stale and needs to be refreshed.

strategies.description: The strategies associated with the feature.

strategy.description: The default strategy for the feature.

parameters.description: Additional parameters associated with the feature.

impressionData.description: Data related to the impressions of the feature.

variants.description: Different variants or options available for the feature.

weight.description: The weight or probability of selection for the variant.

weightType.description: The type of weighting used for the variant, e.g., uniform, exponential, etc.

stickiness.description: Indicates the stickiness of the variant.

payload.description: Data payload associated with the variant.

overrides.description: Any overrides specific to the variant.
